General.Name: Well Lead Med Co Ltd
General.Description: Well Lead Medical Co., Ltd. engages in the research, production, and sale of medical catheters in anaesthesia, urology, respiratory, and hemodialysis areas. It also provides drainage suction nutrition products. Its products are used in hospitals, in division operations, therapies, and emergency and clinical care areas. The company markets and sells its products in China, North America, Europe, and Japan. The company was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Guangzhou, China.
